release_notes.en-US: Version 2.7. Table examples were added. 1) table 1 x 1 option was added. 2) table 2 x 2 option was added. 3) table 3 x 3 option was added. 4) table 4 x 4 option was added. Markup and Markdown editors were not needed anymore on dialog Description

description.en-US: Markup and Markdown editors were not needed anymore on dialog Description. If coupling with TaskviewStyles, it is good enough! Version 2.7. Table examples were added. 1) table 1 x 1 option was added. 2) table 2 x 2 option was added. 3) table 3 x 3 option was added. 4) table 4 x 4 option was added. [Notifications] 1) This is buttons to switch task description colors and font styles on DIALOG. 2) In edit environment, text align can't be used, so text align options are not. 3) Please, use these options after putting cursor on task description box. ^^ 4) Button of TaskDescriptions is not shown at Events and Tasks dialog in tab. 5) Before making table(s), please, have font family be the same between dialog and taskview. send a gift to a friend Eunjo. Executed well as of 2020-08-18. And, I am not a supported developer. Would you contribute some to me for continuous developments. I have happy dreams by one dollar and fifty cents, like an international postage in minimum not a cup of coffee in high price.
